metadata.title: EcoBloom Summer Campaign Planning
metadata.summary: The team is planning the EcoBloom summer campaign with a firm deadline of July 28, 2025. Key dates for content delivery (June 30), design review (July 10), and legal review (July 14) have been set to meet the final deadline.

action_items.task: Schedule kickoff meeting for EcoBloom summer campaign
Prepare initial design concepts for EcoBloom summer campaign
Draft content strategy for EcoBloom summer campaign
Review EcoBloom contract terms for summer campaign

Complete initial designs for EcoBloom
Complete legal review
Complete designs on time

metadata.title: GreenScape Sustainability Report Planning
